meanings.definition: Amusingly unconventional and idiosyncratic in behavior or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The zany hat she wore made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's zany jokes always made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent3: His zany dance moves entertained the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The zany colors of the painting popped out at you.
meanings.sent5: The zany outfit she put together was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A person who is eccentric or unconventional in behavior.
meanings.sent1: The party was full of zanies who kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent2: The circus had a zany who could juggle anything.
meanings.sent3: The zany at the office always had a new idea to share.
meanings.sent4: She was a zany, always surprising us with her antics.
meanings.sent5: The zany in the group brought a unique energy to the team.
